data.text:
U.S. District Judge Fred Biery

Contact InformationBiographical InformationStanding Orders

Courtroom Deputy:

Ms. Jaemie Herndon

(210) 244-5005

Jaemie_Herndon@txwd.uscourts.gov

Assigned Court Reporter:

(210) 244-5036

Chris_Poage@txwd.uscourts.gov

Year Service Began:

1994

Appointed By:

President William Clinton

Education:

Juris Doctor, Southern Methodist University School of Law, 1973

Hatton W. Sumners Scholar

Order of the Coif

Bachelor of Arts, Texas Lutheran University, 1970

Varsity Basketball, 1966-1970

Student Body President, 1968-1970

Legal Practice:

Biery, Biery, Davis and Myers, 1973-1978

Military Service:

U.S. Army Reserve in 1970; entered active duty as E-1, released as E-4 in 1976.

Judicial Practice:

Elevated to Chief Judge on June 1, 2010

Judge, United States District Court, 1994-present

Justice, Texas Fourth Court of Appeals, 1989-1994

Judge, 150th District Court, 1983-1988

Judge, County Court at Law Two, 1979-1982

Memberships:

American Bar Association

State Bar of Texas

San Antonio, Texas Bar Association

Awards:

Outstanding Young Lawyer of San Antonio, 1980

Distinguished Alumni Award, Texas Lutheran University, 1980

Outstanding Young Democrat of Bexar County, 1978

State of Texas Gold Medalist, Senior Olympics Basketball, 1999-2005

Distinguished Alumni Award for Judicial Service, Southern Methodist University Dedman School of Law, 2004

Hatton W. Sumners Foundation Distinguished Public Service Award, 2004

Community Service:

Board of Regents and Corporation Board, Texas Lutheran University, 1970-

Executive Board, Dedman School of Law, Southern Methodist University, 1997-

President, San Antonio Bar Association, 1987-1988

President, William Sessions Chapter, American Inns of Court, 1990-1992

Life Fellow, Texas Bar Foundation

Charter Member, Texas Center for Legal Ethics and Professionalism

Other:

Interests:

Basketball

Gardening

All appearing attorneys shall also review:

Division and districtwide standing orders as applicable

San Antonio courtroom guidance
